review: When it works, I'd rate it four stars--but I don't think a week has gone by that there isn't some issue that gets in the way of accessing what I want to watch.  I suppose the plus side is it generally resolves itself and if I come back in a few hours--or the next day--its okay.  The most recent issue was that between everything I was watching I had to log out of Netflix, unplug the device for 30 seconds, plug it back in, and re-sign in... every time.  That lasted about two days, then fine again.  Sometimes it just doesn't let me in at all; I go away for awhile, and then it's fine again.  Given what I've read in other reviews, I don't know, maybe I just got a dud.
author: Mishka Zakharin "Mishka Zakharin"

review: We like it a lot.  We are old and low-tech, so we were pleasantly surprised at how easy it is to set up.  We love the voice command feature.  It really works.  I have been a little disappointed because most of the movies are NOT free, even though I have Amazon prime, and thought that would make a difference.  Other than having to pay small amounts for almost everything, it's a really cool device.
